channel.title: Comments on: Worldwide DnD Game Day

item.title: By: Anon
item.dc:creator: Anon
item.description: Ha! A new Jack Chick inductee! Mighty surprising that you haven't seen these before . . .
item.content:encoded: Ha! A new Jack Chick inductee! Mighty surprising that you haven’t seen these before . . .

item.title: By: Play Everything
item.dc:creator: Play Everything
item.description:
<strong>Roll for initiative</strong>
Foton at AFK Gamer informs us about World D&D Game Day which apparently is this weekend. We were planning on a bit of construction time this week but I'm sure we'll try and find time to throw the dice around in honor.
item.content:encoded:
Roll for initiative

Foton at AFK Gamer informs us about World D&D Game Day which apparently is this weekend. We were planning on a bit of construction time this week but I’m sure we’ll try and find time to throw the dice around in honor.

item.title: By: Warren
item.dc:creator: Warren
item.description:
This crap kills me (i.e. chick.com). Growing up in the Deep South in the 80's, I remember when my parents quizzed me on if my friends or I play D&D.
Sure, I played a bit - AT BOY SCOUT CAMP. But did that matter? Nope.
I love the irony, tho. We were encouraged to go outside and play army and dress up in fatigues and run around with guns, instead of playing D&D.
This was all before Columbine, of course. ;-)
item.content:encoded:
This crap kills me (i.e. chick.com). Growing up in the Deep South in the 80’s, I remember when my parents quizzed me on if my friends or I play D&D.

Sure, I played a bit – AT BOY SCOUT CAMP. But did that matter? Nope.

I love the irony, tho. We were encouraged to go outside and play army and dress up in fatigues and run around with guns, instead of playing D&D.

This was all before Columbine, of course. ðŸ˜‰

item.dc:creator: Elbows
item.description: I would like to thank chick.com for my sad face of the day.
